attributes.action: Do not allow Huawei any access to Britain’s 5G infrastructures after Coronavirus
attributes.additional_details: Corona virus has shown that we need to be more reliant on British firms and technology. Our country can look after our own infrastructure without outside interference. Huawei also have links to the CCP and should not be allowed anywhere near our 5G for security reasons alone given how secretive and underhanded the CCP have behaved at the beginning of the pandemic.
attributes.background: Huawei were appointed to work on Britain’s 5G infrastructure previously, Remove them now as a contractor.
